issue.title: indy100.com (N: uBlock Origin) (T: Ads)
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBO 1.43.0 + IDCAC 3.4.1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.indy100.com/science-tech/return-to-monkey-island-ron-gilbert

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, ---Third-party filters---, EasyList Lithuania, I don't care about cookies, Adblock List for Finland, Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters, Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Various placeholders in the article. I propose `indy100.com##div[id^=content_]`

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22780683/178169287-b096db73-9eb6-434f-bb78-6761d1f5c4b0.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.deezer.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.deezer.com/us/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.deezer.com%2Fus%2F) ### Comment Username: @dajhorn > Deezer pops this spurious warning when AdGuard is enabled: > > "Your computer seems to be offline. We'll keep trying to reconnect." > > Deezer otherwise behaves properly. The same notification happens with Microsoft Edge and AdGuard for Windows. ### Screenshots

comment.body: It also happens for music that I don't listen to.  I get the notification if pick a random artist by number and let the browser wait on pause.
